page.title: 11ART GALLERY,GATESHEAD
page.content: The Shipley gallery comprises five large galleries ,all on one level, three galleries containing changing displays,including exibits from the perment collection of 16th and 17th century Dutch and Flemish paintings, British 19th century watercolours and drawings.Gallery A displays a large painting by{Tintoretto 'Christ washing {the disciples feet'. { }The gallery workshop offers a full and varied programme of {craft courses.}Strong enthusiastic links with schools and colleges are maintained,offering suppport,visits, demonstrations and information. {CRAFTS AT THE SHIPLEY ART GALLERY Calligraphy,Embroidery,Stick dressing {1985 EXIBITIONS, Contemporary Enamels,Wild Knitting.
